## cartesian2 variable

Converts 2D polar vector `v`<!-- -->, i.e. `[r,Î¸]` (angle in radians) to cartesian coordinates. See `polar2()` for reverse operation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
cartesian2: (v: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Term<"vec2">) => import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Op2<"vec2">
```
